document.full_text: alabama's jefferson county is confident it can cover $70 million in revenue it lost when the state supreme court declared a key county tax illegal, the county commission president said on wednesday.
document.title: alabama county says can cover lost tax revenue
lines_and_colors: alabama's jefferson county is confident it can cover $70 million in revenue it lost when the state supreme court declared a key county tax illegal, the county commission president said on wednesday.
